headline: Analyst Trims Price Target on Eversource Energy (ES) Amid Model Updates in the Utilities Sector
summary: Eversource Energy (NYSE:ES) is included among the 11 Best Utility Stocks to Invest in According to Hedge Funds. Eversource Energy (NYSE:ES) operates New England’s largest energy delivery system and serves customers in Connecticut, Massachusetts, and New Hampshire. On December 12, JPMorgan lowered its price target on Eversource Energy (NYSE:ES) from $72 to $71, while maintaining […]
